badges.text:
§bDeep Treasure§r
§7Using an §bDeep Treasure§7, you can upgrade your §3Angler's Rod§7!
This increases the momentum of Hook Surfing.

§7Using §bDeep Treasure§7, you can upgrade your §fSword§r§9Fish§7!
This increases the Swordfish's damage.

§7§lPassive Ability

§cLegendary Salmon§r
§7Using a §cLegendary Salmon§7, you can upgrade your §3Angler's Rod§7 to tier 4!
This increases numbers of drops you can roll.

§7Using a §cLegendary Salmon§7 on any fishing rod, allows you to enchant it with treasure!
This add an extra drop you can roll while fishing.

§7§lPassive Ability

§6Legendary Pufferfish§r
§7Using a §6Legendary Pufferfish§7, you can upgrade your §fSword§r§9Fish§7 to tier 4!
This deals more damage to entities in water or that are drenched.

§7Using a §6Legendary Pufferfish§7, you can apply water aspect on a book!
This allows you to enchant any sword with water aspect.

§7§lPassive Ability
